___selector.description: The selector to use for the directive.

___spec.description: Specifies if a spec file is generated.

___prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

___module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

___sourceDir.description: The path of the source directory.

___skipImport.description: Flag to skip the module import.

___export.description: Specifies if declaring module exports the directive.

___flat.description: Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

___path.description: The path to create the directive.
